issue.title: [CF 1483] TMW string sharing site
issue.body:
With curse forums down we lost another method to share tmw strings. I'm toying with the idea to create a wago.io for tmw. What you think?

Ora from wago.io has no plans to support it any time soon:

 

dvd - Today at 11:35 PM
@Ora any plans to support tellmewhen strings?

April 4, 2018
Ora - Today at 2:58 AM
no plans to right now
tmw removes any data that is "default" before it creates the export string I guess to keep it shorter
but it also means backwards compatibility is a pain and I dont really want to keep wago on top of those updates


> Posted by CurseForge user dvdscripter | Imported from CurseForge issue #1483 | Raw

comments.body:
That would be a great idea.

 


> Posted by CurseForge user slobakos

Go for it if you feel it would be worth your while. I will neither encourage neither discourage it.

 

Re: that message you quoted... I have no idea what the mention of backwards compatibility there means. All TMW export strings are forward compatible to an absurd degree, because they all keep a version number, and all settings upgrade code since version 1.0 is still in TMW and will still run on old strings. Backwards compatibility is rather pointless - just upgrade your installation of TMW if the string you're trying to import is newer than your current installed version.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Ok, thanks for clarification compatibility.


> Posted by CurseForge user dvdscripter
